altTitles.en: Metal Goddess Soldier
Angels of War
Battle Angels

description.en:
**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

title.en: I Became the Young Villain's Sister-in-Law

altTitles.en: Became the Sister-in-Law of a Young Yandere

description.en:
After being reincarnated as an extra with amnesia, I saved a child by chance, but he was the villain… What? 

The villain had a brother who died because of a fairy's curse. He was the reason for the villain's corruption. How cruel, if I met that fairy, I would have killed her, but unfortunately I'm an extra... 

“Elia?” 

Wait… Am *I* that fairy?
description.fr:
Après avoir possédé une figurante amnésique, j’ai involontairement sauvé un enfant. Mais il s’est révélé qu’il était un méchant.

…Hein ? Le méchant avait un frère aîné décédé à cause de la malédiction d’une fée. Sa mort est ce qui transforme son cadet en méchant. Pauvres frères. Si je rencontrais la fée, je lui mettrais une bonne raclée. Malheureusement, je ne suis qu’une figurante…

«Ellia?»

Attendez… Cette fée, c’est *moi*?

*** Pour pouvoir aller à l’endroit où se trouve la clé pouvant lever la malédiction, je dois me marier. J’ai donc été contrainte à épouser le frère aîné. Je ne sais pas comment lever sa malédiction à cause de l’amnésie. C’est pourquoi j’allais aider à briser ce mauvais sort et demander de l’aide, mais…

«Tu me fais vivre. Quand je te touche, tous les symptômes dus à la malédiction disparaissent.»

Est-ce que l’homme sans émotions qui ne se préoccupait que de son petit frère me sourit-il vraiment affectueusement?

«Grand frère est bête! Comment peux-tu laisser Ellia partir? Je te déteste, grand frère!»

Qui aurait deviné que la relation entre les meilleurs frères au monde se dégraderait ainsi?!

«Le château du grand duc sans Ellia est si effrayant… S’il te plaît, ne divorce pas avec grand frère.»

«Ne peux-tu pas… rester ma femme?»

J’ai été poliment été mise au pied du mur. Mon dieu, que devrais-je faire avec ces deux-là?
description.id: Setelah mengalami amnesia tambahan, saya secara tidak sengaja menyelamatkan seorang anak, tetapi dia adalah seorang penjahat. …Hah? Penjahat itu punya kakak laki-laki yang meninggal karena kutukan peri. Dialah alasan kegelapan penjahat itu. Saudara-saudara yang malang. Jika aku bertemu peri itu, aku akan menghajarnya, sayangnya, aku hanya ekstra… “Ellia?” Tunggu… Jadi peri itu adalah aku?

title.en: Reborn as a Demonic Cultivator: Starting with a Zombie Planet

altTitles.zh: 重生魔修，开局捡到一颗丧尸星球

altTitles.en: Reborn as a Demonic Cultivator, Picking Up a Zombie Planet at the Start

description.en: Chu Xuan traveled through the Cangxuan world and became a demon cultivator of Wuji Sect. The so-called demon cultivation is to plunder the essence of heaven and earth and seize the essence of all things. After slaughtering thousands of people, he became the Great Demon Lord. However, killing is not tolerated by the heavenly way of the human race. Wuji Sect was also destroyed by the righteous sect. When he was helpless, Chu Xuan accidentally got the blood mirror, which could take him to a doomsday planet full of zombies! He suddenly discovered that this place is simply a paradise for demon cultivators!

altTitles.en: Nagai Go version of Barbara

altTitles.ja: 永井豪版 ばるぼら
豪 TO トラベル

altTitles.en: Go and Travel

description.en:
"Barbara" was serialized by Osamu Tezuka from 1973 to 1974. The story tells of an encounter between the novelist, Yosuke Mikura, and the mysterious woman with an alcohol addiction, Barbara. In celebration of the live-action film adaptation directed by Makoto Tazuka, Go Nagai, a master artist, brings a unique interpretation of this world. A dream collaboration between the two great masters... Is born here and now!!

Includes bonus story "Go and Travel" about Tezuka’s and Nagai’s trip to San Diego, USA in 1980.

altTitles.ja: 清田さんは汚されたい！？

altTitles.en: Kiyota-san Wants to Be Defiled

description.en:
Sumiko Kiyota is a plain, ordinary girl with a serious demeanor. While eating lunch alone as usual 
Yuki Shirakawa, the most beautiful and popular girl in class, calls out to her...
description.ja: キレイ好きで真面目で平凡な女子高生・清田澄子。ある日、昼食を食べていると学園いちの美少女・白河ユキにパンをかじられる。その日を境に二人の距離は急接近！　体操着を借りたり、相合傘をしたり、潔癖な清田さんに次々と試練が襲いかかる。「もしかして白河さん、私を汚そうとしている？」　清田さんの妄想はエスカレートしていくが…!?

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

altTitles.en: Please Bully Me, Miss Villainess!

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

title.en: Shi ni Modori Oujo wa Ikinobiru Tameni Yuri Harem wo Tsukuru Koto ni Shita

altTitles.ja: 死に戻り王女は生き延びるために百合ハーレムを作ることにした

altTitles.en: The Death Defying Princess Creates a Yuri Harem to Survive

description.en:
Marie, a domineering and selfish princess, faced her end under the guillotine's blade after her subjects had enough of her. But instead of staying dead, Marie finds herself back a year in the past, though no matter what she does she can never escape the fate that awaits her in a year. Eventually, after Marie learns that the only way to escape her own execution is to conquer a large swathe of 'romantically troubled' women, she decides to use her own 'royal charisma' to build a yuri harem!

A survival yuri fantasy about a princess who defies death is about to begin!

Chun Hajin, the strongest assassin of the Orthodox Murim’s Righteous Heavenly Alliance. Hajin loses his life as he tries to escape to find freedom.

And then…

‘The divine cult is immortal, may all demons submit. Congratulations on your recovery, third young master!’

He was reincarnated into the body of Murim’s public enemy, the third young master of the Demonic Cult?!

The conquest of the Demonic Murim by Chun Hajin, the strongest secret weapon of the Orthodox Murim, begins now.
description.ko:
정파무림 의천맹의 최강 살수, 천하진.

자유를 찾기 위해 탈출을 감행하지만 코앞에서 목숨을 잃고 만다.

그런데… 
'신교불패, 만마앙복. 삼공자님의 쾌유를 경하드리옵니다!'

description.en:
Entertainment writer Lee Seul, heard the news of her favorite idol, Block Shoot's Seung-Chan, on her new entertainment program.
Expectations of meeting her favorite for more than 10 years are brief, and she accidentally sees her favorite idol kissing someone else in secret at the broadcasting station.
In addition, the entertainment program she was in charge of is a love variety program that’s full of dating amongst the cast...
She has to watch her favorite idol flirting and dating someone else even if he's her favorite.

title.en: Isekai De Uwamae Hanete Ikiteiku ~Saisei Mahotsukai No Yuru Fuwa Jinzai Haken Seikatsu~

altTitles.ja: 異世界で 上前はねて 生きていく～再生魔法使いのゆるふわ人材派遣生活～

altTitles.en: Living in Another World by Taking Commissions: A Relaxing and Comfy Life of The Restoration Magician's Staffing Agency

description.en: A company drone who died from overworking was reincarnated as Sawadi, the third son of a merchant in a different world. His cheat skill is restoration magic and support magic. With these cheat skills, he came up with a new business model where he used his restoration magic to cure cheap slaves and made them earn money for him. Although his earnings are steadily increasing, he also has to suffer the consequence of getting his workload also increased... Will Sawadi ever be able to live leisurely without working?
description.ja:
社畜として過労死した男が、異世界の商家の三男・サワディとして転生した。得意としているのは再生魔法と支援魔法。彼はそのチートな性能の魔法を使った新たな商売の種を思いつく。再生魔法で安い奴隷たちを治療して、お金を稼いでもらうことにしたのだ。順調に稼ぎは増えていくが、自業自得で自分の仕事も増えていってしまい……。果たして、サワディは働かずに、のんびり暮らすことができるようになるのか？　ゆるふわファンタジー、ここに開幕！

---
(JP) [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1832fm/)  [Light Novel](https://gaugau.futabanet.jp/list/work/5de5ee3b77656147c9030000/novels)

title.en: Fushi no Kami: Rebuilding Civilization Starts with a Village

altTitles.ja-ro: Fushi no Kami ~Henkyou kara Hajimeru Bunmei Saiseiki~

altTitles.ja: フシノカミ～辺境から始める文明再生記～

description.en: Ash is a young boy with apparent past-life memories who lives in a remote, deserted village. As he remembers leading a bountiful life, he can’t bear living in a world akin to the Dark Ages, where not even the internal combustion engine exists. Ash envisions the rebirth of a civilization where housing with proper sanitation is the norm and the world is connected via a means of transportation faster than horses. For that reason, he is eager to consult books containing knowledge from a highly-developed ancient culture that is rumored to have existed far in the past. Ash makes use of the church’s resources, learning how to read and obtaining the knowledge that he seeks. In addition, he enlists the help of the people around him, including Maika, the village chief’s daughter. Together, they aim to develop their own village. This is only the beginning of the story about a young boy who sets out to revolutionize the world in order to rebuild civilization and create his ideal life!
description.ja:
――意志を繋いだのは、いつだって本だった。

辺境の農村で暮らす少年アッシュには秘密があった。それは今より遙かに豊かな前世らしき記憶を持っている事。あまりに貧しく、辛い生活の中で、決意する――記憶にある便利な生活を、今世に取り戻そう、と。その鍵こそが、古代文明の叡智が記されたという〝書物〟の解読だった――。

title.en: Touhou Suichouka ~ Lotus Eater-tachi no Suisei

altTitles.en: The Lotus Eaters, Drunk and Sober
Touhou Drunken Butterfly Flower ~ Lotus Eaters' Sobering

altTitles.ja: 東方酔蝶華　ロータスイーター達の酔醒

altTitles.pt-br: Touhou: Flor de Borboleta Bêbada ~ Comedores de Lotus, Bêbados e Sóbrios
Flor de Borboleta Bêbada Oriental ~ Os Bêbados e Sóbrios Comedores de Lotus

description.en: In this sixth official Touhou manga series from ZUN, the shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei goes to investigate a strange rumor in the human village, where she gets involved with the local Geidontei bar and its poster girl, Miyoi Okunoda.
description.ja: 幻想郷の人里にある居酒屋「鯢呑亭（げいどんてい）」には、最近、飲んだ帰りの客が妖怪にさらわれて失踪するという噂が。博麗神社の巫女・霊夢はこの疑惑の調査に乗り出す。どうやらカギは看板娘の美宵のようで…？
description.es-la:
En la aldea humana de Gensokyo, un rumor sobre un youkai que supuestamente secuestra a personas alcoholizadas se extiende de forma repentina con gran rapidez, causando miedo y preocupación entre la gente. Mientras tanto, en el centro de este rumor, el bar izakaya Geidontei, no hay nada fuera de lugar en lo que respecta a su comida y bebida, o incluso con respecto a su propietario.

Cuando la sacerdotisa Reimu Hakurei se entera de la situación, intenta cumplir con su deber de investigar el sospechoso establecimiento. Sin embargo, el caso la lleva a otra persona: Miyoi Okunoda, cuya existencia parece ser tan volátil como una burbuja.
description.pt-br:
Uma estranha história sobre álcool. O mais novo mangá oficial de "Touhou", escrito por ZUN.   
  
Existe um rumor de que em um bar chamado "Geidontei", localizado em uma área remota de Gensokyo, um cliente bêbado foi sequestrado por um youkai. Reimu, sacerdotisa do Santuário Hakurei, embarca em uma investigação, mas aparentemente, a chave para desvendar o caso está na garçonete da loja…?

altTitles.ja: 聖母の断罪

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

altTitles.en: Maria's Judgement

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.zh-ro: Gǒu Xuè Wén Nǚ Pèi Tā Bù Gān Le

description.en: Jiang Mo, a part-time worker, transmigrates into a melodramatic (cliché) novel, unexpectedly receives a system that demands her to promote harmony between the male and female leads at the cost of her life. After Jiang Mo nonchalantly completes her tasks, the gaze of the villain boss towards her starts becoming increasingly strange...【I Ended Up Making the Final Boss Fall in Love With Me by Slacking Off】

A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

altTitles.en: One Piece - Digital Colored Comics
One Piece

altTitles.ja: ONE PIECE カラー版

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως ο «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

title.en: Kozure Batsuichi, Saigo no Koi wa Numa deshita.

altTitles.ja: 子連れバツイチ、最後の恋は沼でした。

altTitles.en: Single Mother’s Last Love Was a Bog

description.en: A single mother who despises men is neighbors with a younger, womanizing man! Despite being scum, he is great at cooking and childcare--does that make him an ideal partner?
description.ja:
クズでスパダリな年下男子が、頑張るシンママの心を癒やす!!

シングルマザーの灯子は、誰にも頼ることなく、仕事と育児に大忙しな毎日を送っていた。ある日、過労で倒れてしまった灯子を助けたのは、隣の部屋に住む男子大学生だった。彼はイケメンスペック最強のスパダリ属性でちょっとクズ。男嫌いな灯子の最後の恋が始まりそうで──。

altTitles.ja: ハーモニー

description.en: Published in the slow-release magazine Le Paradis, Harmony is a side story of 14-sai no Koi, following the age gap relationship between middle school student Nagai Tatsumi and his music teacher, Hinohara Yuka.

title.en: Ponkotsu Dai Shuryou-chan to Ossan Sentouin-san.

altTitles.ja: ポンコツ大首領ちゃんとオッサン戦闘員さん。

description.en: Nico Nico Seiga: https://sp.manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/69623

altTitles.ja: ももくり

description.en: Yuki Kurihara is a girl who has finally been granted her wish of dating her crush Shinya Momotsuki (Momo). At first glance, she just looks like a normal but very cute girl. However, she is in fact a maniac over Momo, taking notes of his activities and never missing the chance to see him in a cute moment. Momo, on the other hand, is inexperienced in love, and just wants to make Yuki happy.

altTitles.ja: お姫さまコンプレックス
ハイキュー部！！

description.en: A new official spin-off of the popular weekly series Haikyuu!!, in which our protagonists are the members of the rival schools. A comedy series about their ridiculous antics that you can't read in the original story!

title.en: Miss Wolf and Her Fox Sister

altTitles.zh: 狼小姐和她的狐狸妹妹

description.en: [Savage Wolf X Cunning Fox] In the modern therianthrope world, everyone respects the law of the jungle where the strong prey on the weak. Twenty-year-old Yu Wenxi, as a gray wolf therianthrope, stands at the top of the food chain. She has made a name for herself with her fists. She is violent and volatile, always looking down on the weak. Until one day, when her stepsister left a fox cub with her. From then on, the wild wolf turned into a good big dog. She vowed to raise the crybaby cub, train it into a model student, and give it the best that life has to offer. However, the little fox is hiding a wicked heart under the guise of a good girl...

altTitles.ja: ギミック！

altTitles.zh: 神乎其技 - 特效化妝師

description.en: Kohei Nagase is an prodigy special effects artist. He and pro stuntman, Shingo Kannazuki, form Studio Gimmick. Together, they help people in need of Studio Gimmick's exceptional services. These people's problems are often able to be solved with Kohei's stunning special effects skills.

altTitles.ja: ギルティサークル

description.en: April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
description.ja: ４月！　憧れの青応大学へと入学した大学１年生・沢屋童二は、サークル勧誘期に美少女・星見楓と出会う。「東京に行けば…大学に入れば…サークルに入れば、彼女ができる！」と信じる沢屋は星見楓とともに派手目なサークルの新歓コンパへと参加するが……。沢屋が足を踏み入れたサークルの罪深き実態、秘密とは何か！？
description.pt-br: Abril! A vida universitária de Sawaya Doji em sua escola de sonho da Universidade de Seio começa com um encontro com a bela Kaede Hoshimi durante a feira de recrutamento do clube. Sawaya acredita que se ele for para Tóquio... se ele entrar em uma universidade... se ele entrar em um clube, ele pode conseguir uma namorada! É uma ótima maneira de conhecer novas pessoas, mas em que tipo de clube ele se meteu?

altTitles.ja: 真夜中の俺を見て

altTitles.vi: Dõi Theo Màn Đêm Trong Em

description.en:
Mayo, who is gloomy and lacks self-confidence, is currently active as the bright and cheerful popular VTuber "Mahiru".

The more Mahiru, the polar opposite of his true self, is loved, the more the reality of being alone becomes painful...

Even his manager Ogino, who praises him a lot and spoils him, is probably only looking at Mahiru, not the real "me".

Because he knows this, he can't take Ogino's words "I love you" seriously and wish to be loved by him so much...!

However, as if seeing through Mayo's "desire to be bullied", Ogino asks, "Shall I bully you instead?", revealing the depths of his body trembling with anticipation...!?

A sweet, sadistic, caring manager x an unconsciously masochistic, gloomy VTuber

Development of the mind and body! Pampered Love Days!!!!

title.en: I, Who Have the Natural Charismatic Traits, Was Targeted by Yandere Disciples

altTitles.zh: 天生媚骨的我被病娇徒儿盯上了

altTitles.zh-ro: Tiansheng Meigu De Wo Bei Bing Jiao Tu Er Ding Shangle
Tiānshēng Mèigǔ De Wǒ Bèi Bìng Jiāo Tú Er Dīng Shàngle

altTitles.vi: Trời Sinh Mị Cốt, Ta Bị Đồ Nhi Yandere Để Mắt Tới

description.en: After losing all magical powers, Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?

title.en: Tsuma no Kigen de Tenkou ga Kawaru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 妻の機嫌で天候が変わる話

altTitles.en: The Story of How My Wife's Mood Changes the Weather

description.en: Cloudy couple love comedy between the god of thunder and a human being.

altTitles.ja: 王様のプロポーズ

description.en:
The boy’s strongest first love, a witch who rules over the world with her body and strength! Kuozaki Saika. The most powerful witch who has been saving the world from destruction every 3XX hours, and the director of the magicians’ school.

“…I entrust you, my world…”

And then… the first girl the boy ever loved died, entrusting her body and power to Kuga Mushiki.

Instructed by the servant of Saika, Kuga Mushiki is tasked with attending school as his now-deceased lover so that no one finds out the truth…

He’s feared by his classmates and even his teachers. His life becomes even more troublesome as he reunites with his younger sister who asks for counseling about her love for her own brother- him!

In a crumbling and dystopian Lousiana, Rilind, a zombie, aims to help those cast out from society using a peculiar power- Magic "strings" which can heal wounds. However, his world begins to change when he makes the unlikely choice to save a vampire in distress. Rilind soon learns he's way in over his head when he learns she has a bounty on hers!

title.en: My Trainee Teacher Is Actually a Goth Rocker

altTitles.vi: Cô giáo thực tập của tôi thực ra là 1 Goth Rocker

altTitles.ja: スイカ

description.ja: 怪奇現象や幽霊の目撃情報が絶えない呪われし丑光高等学校。この学校に赴任してきた教師・園 渚のクラスには丑光高校に伝わる百七不思議のひとつ、物部スイカという小学生（？）が居座っていた。オカルト的な噂を一切信じない園だったが、スイカに気に入られたことで不可解で笑えるトラブルに巻き込まれていく!!

altTitles.en: I Want to See You Embarrassed

altTitles.ja: 恥じらう君が見たいんだ

altTitles.th: เทคนี้ที่ผมถ่ายเป็นเรื่องน่าอายที่เธอไม่คัท

altTitles.zh-hk: 想看妳露出羞恥的模樣

description.en: Akito Shirasawa, a high school boy whose father is a film director, sees something in the library preparation room. It was the "masturbation scene" of his classmate, Kaho Honjou. Akito is puzzled, but ends up filming it with his smartphone. Kaho notices Akito, and in the men's restroom, makes a "proposal" to Akito! Exposed high school girl and movie boy. The "exposed love" of twisted adolescence, begins!
description.es-la: Akito Shirasawa, un chico de secundaria cuyo padre es director de cine, ve algo en la sala de preparación de la biblioteca. Era la "escena de la masturbación" de su compañera de clase, Natsuho Honjo. Akito está desconcertado, pero termina filmándolo con su teléfono inteligente. Natsuho nota a Akito, y en el baño de hombres, ¡le hace una "propuesta" a Akito! Chica de secundaria expuesta y chico de película. ¡Comienza el "amor expuesto" de la retorcida adolescencia!

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

altTitles.en: The Gourmet

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

title.en: Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 生意気なギャル姉を解らせる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Namaiki na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of Making My Cheeky Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gyaru Sister Understand

altTitles.es-la: El día que decidí hacer entender a mi descarada hermana gal a mi manera

description.en: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
description.ja: 口を開けば暴言ばかりで、問題行動が絶えない姉。 彼女に痺れを切らし、主人公が踏み出した“計画”とは---??!
description.es-la:
Su hermana siempre dice cosas hirientes y cuyos comportamientos problemáticos nunca cesan, el protagonista, cansado de ella, da un paso adelante con un "plan"
¿Cuál será...?

title.en: Netoge no Yome ga Ninki Idol Datta: Cool kei no Kanojo wa Genjitsu demo Yome no Tsumori de Iru

altTitles.ja: ネトゲの嫁が人気アイドルだった件～クール系の彼女は現実でも嫁のつもりでいる～

altTitles.en: My Web Game Wife Is a Popular Idol IRL

altTitles.vi: Vợ trong game của tôi là Idol nổi tiếng ngoài đời

altTitles.ru: Моя жена в онлайн-игре – популярный айдол

altTitles.th: ไอดอลสาวสุดปังกับผมแต่งงานกันในเกมออนไลน์ ~(แต่) แฟนสาวสุดคูลอยากเป็นเจ้าสาวในโลกจริงด้วย~

altTitles.en: My Wife in the Web Game Is a Popular Idol

description.en: Kazuto Ayanokoji is an ordinary high school boy. He spends his days playing online games as a hobby. One day, he discovers the true identity of a friend who is so close to him that they are married in-game. It turns out to be a cool idol from the same class, Rinka Mizuki. As Rinka tries to act as his wife in real life, Kazuto is forced to lead a dizzying life.
description.ja: 平凡な男子高校生・綾小路和斗には嫁がいる。ただし趣味のネトゲ世界で。ところが結婚相手の少女リンの正体は、学校のクラスメイトで人気アイドルの『水樹凛香』で!? 正体がバレて関係も終わり――かと思いきや、凛香は現実でも和斗の「嫁」として振る舞い始めて……。
description.vi: Ayanokouji Kazuto là một cậu học sinh cao trung bình thường. Cậu có sở thích là chơi game vào thời gian rảnh của mình. Một ngày, cậu phát hiện ra danh tính thật của người bạn thân mà cậu đã kết hôn trong game. Người đó không ai khác chính là Rinka Mizuki, một idol và cũng là một người bạn cùng lớp của cậu. Trong khi Mizuki Rinka cố gắng để cư xử với cậu như một người vợ, cậu phải trải qua một cuộc sống hằng ngày mệt mỏi.

title.en: [Rouhou] Ore no Iinazuke ni Natta Jimiko, Ie de wa Kawaii Shika nai.

altTitles.en: [Good News] The Plain-Looking Girl, Who Became My Fiancée, Is Only Cute at Home
[Good News] My Plain-Looking Fiancee Is Secretly Sweet With Me

altTitles.ja: 【朗報】俺の許嫁になった地味子、家では可愛いしかない。

altTitles.vi: Hôn Thê Nhạt Nhẽo Của Tôi Chỉ Đáng Yêu Khi Ở Nhà

altTitles.pt-br: [Boas Notícias] A Garota Quieta que se Tornou Minha Esposa, É a Mais Linda Dentro de Casa!

altTitles.ja-ro: [Rōhō] Ore no Iinazuke ni Natta Jimi-ko, Kade wa Kawaii Shika Nai.

altTitles.th: เมื่อสาว3Dสุดแสนเงียบขรึมได้กลายมาเป็นภรรยาสุดแสนจะน่ารักของผมเฉพาะที่บ้านเท่านั้น

altTitles.zh-hk: 【好消息】我的不起眼未婚妻在家裡有夠可愛 小說

altTitles.zh: 【好消息】我的不起眼未婚妻在家里有够可爱 小说

altTitles.ko: 【낭보】나의 약혼녀가 된 수수녀, 집에서는 귀엽기민 하다

altTitles.vi: Vị hôn thê với vẻ ngoài giản dị chỉ âm thầm ngọt ngào với tôi khi ở nhà

description.en:
“Onii-san, congratulations on your marriage. This person is your bride.”

“M-my name is Watanae Yuuka… I’m in the same class as you…”

My name is Sakata Yuuichi. I’m in my 2nd year of high school. Due to my parents’ circumstances, I’m suddenly getting married..? Furthermore, my partner is a plain girl, Watanae-san. During my 3rd year of middle school, I went through a bad experience. Ever since then, I’ve only been interested in 2D heroines. There’s absolutely no way I’d ever be interested in a 3D girl. That was what I thought, but…

“…Well then, who’s your favorite heroine right now?”

Turns out, she was actually an otaku and she becomes very talkative when you get to know her. She’d always happily engage in our conversations. She showed me things I’d never have expected from a girl in my class.

“Err, since we’re going to be living together… Is it okay if I call you Yuu-kun?”

And, the moment I let my guard down, she’d instantly try to shorten the distance between us. What’s more…

“Just between you and me, I’m actually the voice actress for Yuuna Izumi from 『Alice Stage』. Thank you for always supporting me!”

It’s a secret from everyone else, but it turns out she’s actually my favorite heroine’s voice actress?! I am only interested in 2D heroines! But, Yuuka’s true self, which she only shows when she’s alone with me, is nothing but cute! This is the story of me and Yuuka, starting as bethrothed. A heartwarming and chaotic romcom!
description.ja: 親の都合で結婚させられることになった高校生の俺。お相手は――なんとアイドルゲームの声優だった!!まさかの“中の人”との同棲生活がスタート!　2人だけの新生活は、甘くて可愛いしかない!?
description.pt-br:
“Nii-san, parabéns pelo seu casamento. Esta pessoa é sua noiva. ”
"M-meu nome é Watanae Yuuka... estou na mesma classe que você ..."

Meu nome é Sakata Yuuichi. Estou no segundo ano do ensino médio.
Devido às circunstâncias dos meus pais, de repente vou me casar ..?
Além disso, minha parceira é uma garota comum, Watanae-san.
Durante meu terceiro ano do ensino médio, passei por uma experiência ruim. Desde então, só me interessei por heroínas 2D. Não há absolutamente nenhuma maneira de eu me interessar por uma garota 3D.
Foi o que pensei, mas ...

“...Bem, então quem é a sua heroína favorita agora?”

Acontece que ela era na verdade uma otaku que fala bastante quando você fica intimo dela.
Ela sempre se envolveria com prazer em nossas conversas. Ela me mostrou coisas que eu nunca esperaria de uma garota da minha classe.

"Eh, já que vamos morar juntos... Tudo bem se eu te chamar de Yuu-kun?"

E, no momento em que baixei a guarda, ela imediatamente tentaria encurtar a distância entre nós.
O que mais…

“Só entre você e eu, na verdade sou a dubladora de Izumi Yuuna de『Alice Stage』. Obrigado por sempre me apoiar! ”

É um segredo para todos os outros, mas acontece que ela é na verdade a dubladora da minha heroína favorita?!
Estou interessado apenas em heroínas 2D!
Mas, o verdadeiro eu de Yuuka, que ela só mostra quando está sozinha comigo, não é nada além de fofa! 
Esta é a minha história com Yuuka, começando como noivos. Um romcom comovente e caótico!

title.en: Kuro no Senki II - Isekai Teni Shita Boku ga Saikyou na no wa Bed no Ue dake no You desu

altTitles.en: Kuro no Senki II: It Seems that I, Who has Moved to Another World, is the Strongest Only on the Bed
Record Of Kurono's War II

altTitles.ja: クロの戦記Ⅱ 異世界転移した僕が最強なのはベッドの上だけのようです

description.en: Kurono Crawford (Chrono Crawford), a noble of Cepheus Empire had a secret. It was that he came from a Different world… Modern Japan. Having the knowledge about the modern weapons and his sense of values, he was an existence almost like a cheat, aiming to be the “Harem king”.    Abandoned by his superiors, left in command of the Empire’s rejects consisting of demi-humans such as Minotaurs, Dwarfs, and Elves, and thrust into a position as head of a poor fiefdom, Chrono will do everything he can to rebuild and strengthen his forces and revitalize the land, aided in part by his knowledge of the other world.
description.ja: ある日突然異世界に転移させられた黒野久光は、名前をクロノ・クロフォードと変え千人の亜人軍を率いて一万の敵軍と戦う事になる。亜人軍の指揮官として武勲を立てたクロノは皇女より公爵領の領地を任され、領地改革に乗り出していた！未経験の領地経営を現代知識を絞り、なんとか領地を立て直していく。そうした中、クロノの周りには魅力的な女性たちが集まっていき…？
description.pt-br: Kurold Crawford um nobre do Império Kefaus, tinha um segredo. ele veio de um mundo diferente… O Japão moderno. Tendo o conhecimento sobre as armas modernas e seu senso de valores, sua existência é quase como uma trapaça, com o objetivo de ser o "rei do Harém".    Abandonado por seus superiores, deixado no comando dos rejeitados do Império, consistindo de demi-humanos como Minotauros, Anões e Elfos, e levado à posição de chefe de um feudo pobre, Kuro fará tudo o que puder para reconstruir e fortalecer suas forças e revitalizar a terra, auxiliado em parte por seus conhecimentos do outro mundo….

title.en: The Master of the Grand Prince

altTitles.en: [Prominent-Figures Observation, Record Anthology] His Majesty the Grand Prince's Master
Your Majesty the Great King's Master
His Majesty the Grand Prince's Master

altTitles.ja: いのちの食べ方

altTitles.en: How to Eat Life

description.en:
Otogiri Tobi, a 2nd grade middle school student, spends his depressing days searching for his missing older brother alongside his inhuman companion, Baku.
Tobi used to rarely speak to anyone besides Baku, however one day after his classmate Shiratama Ryuuko suddenly approaches him, his life begins to change…?

This is an adventure surrounding the “human” and the “inhuman” that a lone boy faces.
___
**Character Designers:** [Mariyasu](https://mangadex.org/author/c4b0336b-a879-4634-9053-9efb11c3f71b), [Waboku](https://mangadex.org/author/03dcd51c-8a6b-4302-8c84-d943a039db25), [lack](https://mangadex.org/author/b68dc199-aaab-4deb-825a-5f3df6482b28)

**Note:** Adapted from the song and novel of the same name.

title.en: Issho ni Kurashite ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: 一緒に暮らしていいですか？

altTitles.en: May I Live With You?

description.en: Hiromi Sonoda has no girlfriend, no job, and no home, until he finds a shared-house with very cheap rent and goes to check it out. However, the share-house has a certain condition... Kei Sasuga presents a new "Share House Romantic Comedy"!
description.fr:
Hiromi Sonoda n'a plus de petite amie, plus de travail et plus de maison, jusqu'à ce qu'il trouve une colocation au loyer très bon marché et qu'il aille la visiter. Cependant, la colocation est soumise à certaines conditions...
Kei Sasuga présente sa nouvelle "Share House Romantic Comedy" !
description.id: Hiromi Sonoda tidak punya pacar, tidak punya pekerjaan, dan tidak punya rumah, sampai dia menemukan rumah kos-kosan dengan harga sewa yang sangat murah dan pergi untuk melihatnya. Namun, rumah kos-kosan memiliki syarat tertentu... Kei Sasuga menghadirkan "Komedi Romantis Rumah Kos-kosan" baru!
description.ja: 「幸せな家庭」を夢見る園田寛美は、職を失い同棲中の彼女に振られて、家ナシ金ナシ彼女ナシに…。そんなときに、間違えて入居したのが、なんと女性専用シェアハウスだった!!
description.pt-br: Hiromi é um homem que sempre sonhou em ter uma família calorosa e amorosa por causa de um incidente em seu passado. Entretanto, depois que sua namorada terminou com ele por várias razões, ele começa a desistir de seu sonho e pensa que nunca será capaz de realizá-lo. Sem um lugar para viver, ele chega a uma casa compartilhada cheia de mulheres. Será que ele vai encontrar o lar e a família que ele almeja neste novo lugar?

title.en: WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!

altTitles.en: It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular

altTitles.ja: わたモテ
私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!

altTitles.ko: 내가 인기 없는 건 아무리 생각해도 너희들 탓이야!

altTitles.th: สาวมืดมนอลวนหารัก

altTitles.es-la: No importa como lo vea, ¡Es culpa suya que yo no sea popular!

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!

altTitles.pt-br: Não É Minha Culpa Não Ser Popular!

description.en:
Tomoko Kuroki naturally assumed she'd be popular when she got to high school... but then cold, hard reality swooped in for the attack! Turns out all the popularity points she's racked up in her video game dating sims are worth squat in real life, and Tomoko's far from prepared to navigate high school! 

How can she possibly hope to impress her classmates when she can't even talk to them?! A new high-school heroine is born (maybe?)!
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.
description.pt-br:
Tomoko Kuroki naturalmente presumiu que ela seria popular quando chegasse ao ensino médio... mas então a realidade fria e dura se abateu para o ataque! Acontece que todos os pontos de popularidade que ela acumulou em seus simuladores de namoro de videogame valem a pena na vida real, e Tomoko está longe de estar preparada para passar pelo ensino médio!

Como ela pode esperar impressionar seus colegas quando ela nem consegue falar com eles?! Nasce uma nova heroína do ensino médio (talvez?)!

altTitles.ja: しゅごキャラ！ ジュエルジョーカー

description.en:
The long-awaited comeback! A new story of Amu and her guardian characters begins...!

The cool and spicy Amu Hinamori has graduated from Seiyo Academy's elementary school and is finally a junior high school student! She thought she would have carefree days with her precious friends in junior high... until she is asked to take on a mission related to guardian characters and has to transfer to a new school...!

altTitles.ja: ハーフサキュバスを拾った

altTitles.en: Taking Home a Half Succubus

altTitles.es-la: Llevando a casa una medio súcubo

altTitles.vi: Tôi nhặt về nhà một bán Succubus

description.en: Take a child half succubus and half human.
description.id: Mungut anak setengah succubus dan setengah Manusia

altTitles.ja: ケントゥリア

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

"You have power, and you are dissatisfied with the world. Would you want to change the world… or would you rather change yourself?” —. Akane Senri.

Amidst a path of thorns can be the calm before the storm. Perhaps, happiness on the road to hell is not a punishment, but a reward promising things to come.

In the eco-centric city of Kazamatsuri, a boy named Kotarou strives to assert himself in high school and attain an ordinary, peaceful life, but finds himself afflicted by odd phenomena within the city that seem supernatural. In his curiosity, he seeks out the rumored witch of the occult club, Akane Senri, and is inspired to join her club to prove the supernatural exists.

Undeterred by her mysteriously probing questions and prickly nature, Kotarou brings life to the club and even recruits new members, forming a circle of friends in the process. But when they finally find proof, it becomes apparent that these strange events are symptoms of a dying world., and that his friends are hiding secret agendas fated to clash over this very subject.

After the club collapses, Kotarou puts his trust in Akane and decides to serve as her shield to aid her work within "Gaia"- a cult of environmentalist mages determined to preserve nature at any cost. As Kotarou's actions behind the scenes grow in proportion to Akane's influence and leadership within Gaia, the pair's emotions become increasingly entwined.

Faced with the resolve to turn the whole world against them in order to fulfill their goals, the pair finds unexpected happiness and comfort in each others' company. 

(This is a fan comic based on the storyline within Akane's Route of the visual novel titled "Rewrite”. This work is also a prequel to the doujin "Dear Secret Rose")

title.en: Even Though I Transmigrated as a Villainess, I'd Rather Raise a Cat

altTitles.en: I Reincarnated as a Villainess, but Why Did I Become a Cat Butler Instead?
Even Though I Possessed a Villain, I Still Want to Raise a Cat

altTitles.ru: Мной завладел злодей, но я всё ещё хочу вырастить кота

description.en:
I transmigrated as Rowaine, the villainess who was executed for abusing a werebeast. In order to escape death, I decided to replace my sister Linier in her arranged marriage.

The problem is that Duke Blois, the groom, is a cat werebeast who is known as a bloodthirsty battlefield monster…

“My dear, I heard your hobbies include abusing werebeasts like myself.”

“I haven’t heard of such a condition stating that women who abused werebeasts could not be Your Grace’s wife, though.”

His emerald eyes flashed dangerously at me, I quickly kept speaking before he could say anything.

“If my hobby is a problem, then I promise that I will never abuse you, Your Grace.”

“Ha– what?”

This is the story of a ten-year contractual marriage between a cat lover and a prickly cat werebeast.

altTitles.en: Dragon Ball - Digital Colored Comics
Dragon Ball - Full Color Edition

altTitles.ja: DRAGON BALL カラー版

description.en: Goku and friends battle intergalactic evil in the greatest action-adventure-fantasy-comedy-fighting series ever! Legend has it that if all seven of the precious orbs called “Dragon Balls” are gathered together, an incredibly powerful dragon god will appear to grant one wish. Unfortunately, the orbs are scattered across the world, making them extremely difficult to collect. Enter 16-year-old Bulma, a scientific genius who has constructed a radar to detect the exact locations of the Dragon Balls. She’s on a mission to find all seven orbs, but first she must convince young Son Goku to join her on her quest. With a monkey tail, superhuman strength and a magic staff for a weapon, Son Goku is ready to set out on the adventure of a lifetime…

altTitles.ja: ぷっちぎれ！
ブッチギレ！4コマ漫画
